findings.title: ReentrancyGuard
findings.description: The ReentrancyGuard finding indicates a potential reentrancy vulnerability in the smart contract.

findings.title: Reentrancy Vulnerability
findings.description: The functions createMarketItem, cancelMarketItem, and buyItem are marked as nonReentrant, indicating a potential reentrancy vulnerability.

findings.title: Reentrancy Vulnerability in checkIsItem
findings.description: The function buyItem in NFTMarket contract has a reentrancy vulnerability due to the non-reentrant modifier 'checkIsItem'. This can lead to unintended behavior and potential security risks.

findings.title: Reentrancy Vulnerability in checkIsHero
findings.description: The function checkIsHero has a reentrancy vulnerability due to the nonReentrant modifier.

findings.title: Restricted Access
findings.description: Some functions have restricted access without proper validation, allowing onlyOwner or unauthorized users to perform critical operations.
